title: Blow for Miliband: UK power turned dirtier in 2025, with electricity generated from fossil fuels rising for first time in four years
description: The proportion of power generated by gas and other dirty fuels increased for the first time in four years, according to analysis of Government figures.

title: Unearthing ancient Dwarka again: ASI plans deeper land and sea exploration
Methane from Lunar Landers May Contaminate Ancient Organic Molecules at the Moon's Poles
description: Learn how exhaust methane from lunar spacecraft may pollute the moon, potentially contaminating molecules that are billions of years old.

title: How did these strange, ancient organisms turn into such remarkable fossils? - EurekAlert!
description: How did these strange, ancient organisms turn into such remarkable fossils? EurekAlert!

title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath Hails Book For Highlighting India’s Ancient Cultural Legacy
description: The Chief Minister remarked that anyone seeking to understand democracy must look to India. He recalled Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s statement at the G20 Summit that India is not only the world’s largest democracy but also the “Mother of Democracy.” Vaishali, one of the earliest known republics in world history, stands as living proof of this tradition.
